t = int(input())
for c in range(0, t):
    v = int(input())
    n = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = n.count(2)
    j = x // 2
    y = 2 ** (x - 1)
    if x % 2 == 1:
        print(-1)
    elif x == 0:
        print(1)
    else:
        l = [i for (i, b) in enumerate(n) if b == 2][j - 1]
        print(l + 1)
